caption.p: Evolution of the ART eligibility in the UTT trial areas from 1 January 2012 to 31 December 2016. WHO, World Health Organization; N, National recommendations; C, Control arm of the trial; I, intervention arm of the trial; A, Intervention arm A in the Pop ART trial; B, Intervention arm B in the Pop ART trial, *shift to universal antiretroviral therapy in the Pop ART communities in Zambia as part of a pilot for a national roll out.
